string-array.item: You are severely underweight. It is a sign that you\'re not eating enough or you may be ill.
You are underweight So you may need to put on some weight.
You are at a healthy weight for your height. You lower your risk of developing serious health problems.
You are slightly overweight. You may be advised to lose some weight for health reasons.
You are heavily overweight. Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight.
